targets.expr: sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (service) / sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (service)

sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (protocol) / sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (protocol)

sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (method) / sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (method)

sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (code) / sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval])) by (code)
sum(increase(traefik_service_requests_total{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", code=~"(4|5).."}[$__interval])) by (code, protocol, method, service) > 0
sum(increase(traefik_service_requests_bytes_total{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", code=~"(4|5).."}[$__interval])) by (code, protocol, method, service) > 0
sum(increase(traefik_service_responses_bytes_total{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", code=~"(4|5).."}[$__interval])) by (code, protocol, method, service) > 0

sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", code=~"(4|5).."}[$__rate_interval])) by (code, protocol, method, service) / sum(rate(traefik_service_request_duration_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service", code=~"(4|5).."}[$__rate_interval])) by (code, protocol, method, service) > 0
